DOC.brief_summary: To determine phototoxic potential topically applied article human subject .
DOC.criteria: Be male female age 18 60 inclusive ; Be lightly pigment ( Fitzpatrick Skin Type I , II , III ) ; Have read sign write Informed Consent Form complete HIPAA Authorization Form conformance 45CFR Parts 160 164 ; Be general good health determine subject 's medical history discretion investigator . Have visible sunburn ; Have history sun hypersensitivity/photosensitivity photosensitive dermatosis ; Must know sensitivity allergy active nonactive ingredient test product . Have history allergy sensitivities cosmetic , toiletry dermatological product .
